title: ‘Dr. Oz Show’ to End as Host Preps for Senate Run
sub_head: Mehmet Oz has joined a crowded GOP primary in Pennsylvania
body:
“The Dr. Oz Show” will end Jan. 14, Sony Pictures Television said Monday, weeks after host Mehmet Oz filed paperwork to run for Senate.
The show is currently in its 13th season, for which it had 27 million viewers, Sony said.
